Package de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.transport

Transport connection API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TransportAttributes
    Common attributes for every TransportConnection.
    TransportConnection
    Generic TransportConnection to control an underlying connection.
    TransportConnectionBuilder<T>
    Generic TransportConnectionBuilder to create a TransportConnection with an underlying transport object (e.g.
    TransportConnectionPhase
    Extensible enumeration for transport connection phases.
    TransportListener
    Listener which is notified to receive a message buffer and when the TransportConnection is closed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultTransportAttributes
    Default attributes for a TransportConnection.
